blog.name: incorrecthogwartsmysteryquotes

blog.description: The quotes are based on the characters from the game "Harry Potter: hogwarts mystery", because we can never have enough Harry Potter characters. Feel free to message me, submit something or send an ask about anything, except for pineapples. Tags are weird ok.

summary: Sirius maybe you should ASK Regulus how he is instead of just assuming he's okay because he hasn't said anything?
question: Sirius maybe you should ASK Regulus how he is instead of just assuming he's okay because he hasn't said anything?
answer: Sirius: Because we’re having fun.  If there was something upsetting him, I’m pretty sure he’d tell me.

summary: Arthur: Now, let’s say you haven’t eaten for days and you’re in desperate need of a sandwich. What do you do?  Fred: I walk down...
body:
Arthur: Now, let’s say you haven’t eaten for days and you’re in desperate need of a sandwich. What do you do?

Fred: I walk down to the kitchen and have Mom make me a sandwich. 

Arthur: Okay yes, but Mom’s not here. 

George: Where’s Mom?

Arthur: It’s not important where she is. She’s gone. She left the country.

George: She left the country? Why? Is she okay?

Arthur: Yes, she’s fine.

Fred: Well, if she’s fine I don’t see why she couldn’t make me a sandwich.

reblog.comment:

George: She left the country? Why? Is she okay?

Arthur: Yes, she’s fine.

Fred: Well, if she’s fine I don’t see why she couldn’t make me a sandwich.

trail.content_raw:

Fred: I walk down to the kitchen and have Mom make me a sandwich. 

Arthur: Okay yes, but Mom’s not here. 

George: Where’s Mom?

Arthur: It’s not important where she is. She’s gone. She left the country.

George: She left the country? Why? Is she okay?

Arthur: Yes, she’s fine.

Fred: Well, if she’s fine I don’t see why she couldn’t make me a sandwich.
trail.content:
Arthur: Now, let’s say you haven’t eaten for days and you’re in desperate need of a sandwich. What do you do?

Fred: I walk down to the kitchen and have Mom make me a sandwich. 

Arthur: Okay yes, but Mom’s not here. 

George: Where’s Mom?

Arthur: It’s not important where she is. She’s gone. She left the country.

George: She left the country? Why? Is she okay?

Arthur: Yes, she’s fine.

Fred: Well, if she’s fine I don’t see why she couldn’t make me a sandwich.

summary: Gilderoy how is your summer going?
question: Gilderoy how is your summer going?
answer: Gilderoy: It’s nice to be at home with the people who will always love me unconditionally.  They’ve been acting strange around me, though.  They’re not used to the new me.  It’s really opened my eyes to the fact that even my family don’t recognise the real me now that I’ve stopped pretending to be someone I’m not.  I don’t know what I was doing with my life.

reblog.comment: Gilderoy: It’s nice to be at home with the people who will always love me unconditionally.  They’ve been acting strange around me, though.  They’re not used to the new me.  It’s really opened my eyes to the fact that even my family don’t recognise the real me now that I’ve stopped pretending to be someone I’m not.  I don’t know what I was doing with my life.

trail.content_raw: Gilderoy: It’s nice to be at home with the people who will always love me unconditionally.  They’ve been acting strange around me, though.  They’re not used to the new me.  It’s really opened my eyes to the fact that even my family don’t recognise the real me now that I’ve stopped pretending to be someone I’m not.  I don’t know what I was doing with my life.
trail.content: Gilderoy: It’s nice to be at home with the people who will always love me unconditionally.  They’ve been acting strange around me, though.  They’re not used to the new me.  It’s really opened my eyes to the fact that even my family don’t recognise the real me now that I’ve stopped pretending to be someone I’m not.  I don’t know what I was doing with my life.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: Once again ya’ll I am not proud of this drawing but heRE is something I drew like a year ago or something It’s Shane our...
caption:
Once again ya’ll I am not proud of this drawing but heRE is something I drew like a year ago or something
It’s Shane our resident blond OC in his Slytherin robes
Sometimes he’s Slytherin and sometimes he’s Ravenclaw and sometimes he’s Slytherclaw 
Our boy is v smart n humble and is pretty adept at magic in most of our fantasy AUs
He’s never not always confident but when he is he got a sexy smirk that makes Addi go #0.0#
What an awkward blond bun we love him
